Error.description: 1 = error state active (no power or atmosphere unsafe).

Lock.description: 1 = locked, prevents entry/exit.

Setting.description: Output power in watts for signal transmission.

SignalStrength.description: Angle offset from strongest contact. -1 = no contact or resolving.

SignalID.description: Reference ID of strongest contact. -1 = no contact.

InterrogationProgress.description: Contact interrogation progress. -1 = no contact, 1 = contacted.

TargetPadIndex.description: Index of target landing pad for trader.

SizeX.description: Trader's required pad size X. -1 = no resolved contact.

SizeZ.description: Trader's required pad size Z. -1 = no resolved contact.

MinimumWattsToContact.description: Minimum watts needed to contact trader. -1 = no resolved contact.

WattsReachingContact.description: Actual watts reaching contact. -1 = no resolved contact.

ContactTypeId.description: Trader type ID hash. 0 = no contact.

BestContactFilter.description: Filter to specific contact by ReferenceId. -1 = no filter.
